_comment_DEFINITION: All the keys below are secretive words.
_comment_PLACES: The places setting order 1st, 2nd, 3rd, middle, last (Nested lists are synonyms).
_comment_EVEN: MIDDLE allowed for even number of teams.
_comment_ODD: MIDDLE allowed for odd number of teams.
_comment_LAST: True for the last team or False for before last team in the teams list
